overview: Miss Brando (Jayne Woods), a sorority house mother, reminisces on her wild days as a young student in a sorority. While a lot has changed, some things like love, passion and sisterhood remain the same. Madeline (Mackenzie Moss) and Penny (Jill Kassidy) are reunited after a year apart and Madeline convinces Penny to join her sorority. Things get hot and heavy when Madeline explains the light hazing ritual and the pair finally kiss. Lucy (Ashlee Juliet) and Julia (Abigail Mac) play with a Ouija board and get some intimate answers from the other side. In the throes of first semester blues, Cynthia (Cadence Lux) has been struggling to get out of bed. With the help and affection of her sorority sister, Sara (Bree Daniels), Cynthia, starts to see the bright side of life. During Thanksgiving break, Miss Brando relives her wild youth as she is seduced by a lonely student, Isabelle (Kenzie Reeves).
title: Sorority Love And Lust
